about_the_game:
The White Noise 2 Supporter pack was created as a "Thank you" gift to our Early Access supporters. It features 2 new items:

The Metal Flashlight


Powerful and sturdy, this flashlight will work even under the harshest conditions.

A new flashlight with improved Range

The Fungus


This unearthly Fungus feeds from the bodily remains that other predators leave behind.

An Idol with improved Detection and the Spores trait, increasing the Creature's speed when it's nearby.
detailed_description:
The White Noise 2 Supporter pack was created as a "Thank you" gift to our Early Access supporters. It features 2 new items:

The Metal Flashlight


Powerful and sturdy, this flashlight will work even under the harshest conditions.

A new flashlight with improved Range

The Fungus


This unearthly Fungus feeds from the bodily remains that other predators leave behind.

An Idol with improved Detection and the Spores trait, increasing the Creature's speed when it's nearby.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: For AMD Graphic cards, MESA drivers newer than 10.1.5 are recommended.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.10 or newer
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 660 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+, tested on OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.5GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+, tested on OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: White Noise 2 - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable hardware
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64bit OS recommended but not required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Graphics: GeForce 660 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The White Noise 2 Supporter Pack features 2 new items: The Metal Flashlight and the Fungus Idol.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Finnish, Russian, French, German, Portuguese - Portugal, Norwegian, Hungarian, Simplified Chinese
